range.simple: SELECT * FROM tbl WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10
range.orderby: SELECT * FROM tbl WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY col
range.sum: SELECT SUM(col) FROM tbl WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY col
range.distinct: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM tbl WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY col

update.no_index: UPDATE tbl SET col=10 WHERE id=4
update.index: UPDATE tbl SET col=col+1 WHERE id<300
